column4: can anyone help me? I've been trying to get my ubuntu box to connect to my router hours without any success
does 'sudo iwlist wlan0 scanning' see your router? or eth1 or whatever
ifconfig will list your network devices
well im connecting through wire
yes, it will list unconnected ones too
yes I have 2: eth0 and lo
then you don't have the driver for your wireless installed
what wireless? I dont have wireless
sorry, I assumed wireless when you said router
np
do you have an inet addr listed next to eth0?
type route
well that should show your default gateway
and the mask is 0.0.0.0
i thought its supposed to be 255.255.255.0
Genmask, on gateway is correct
it is?
yes, that's what mine is showing, I can log into my router fine at the address that shows on that line
oh ok
did you manage to get into it?
